summary.p: The volume 1 of a 2-volume Kamparāmāyaṇam (BnF Indien 275-276).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (January 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: the front cover. Verso marbled. Shelfmark on verso.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Recto marbled.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Shelfmark on recto. Verso blank.

240 folios = Kamparāmāyaṇam. No original Tamil foliation/pagination. Arabic library foliation foliation 1–240 in black pencil on the top right corner of recto of folios. 30 quires (8 folios each) numbered on the top left corner (up to f97r) or on the top right corner (from f105r onwards).
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Verso marbled.

additions.desc:
Title printed in Roman transcription printed in goldens letters on the spine:
KAMBA
RÂMÂYANAM
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 275 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 275 (f[1]r).
Total stanzas table (entitled kamparāmāyaṇam; no column): chapter's name followed by its total stanzas (viruttam).

binding.p: Leather (red). Title and monograms on spine.

origin.origDate: 1732 at the latest. No internal date. Dated to circa 1720 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1750 by Cabaton (1912), mentioning the old shelfmark ancien fonds XII. The correct old shelfmark appears to be ancien fonds XLI.

acquisition.p: It appears to be the first volume of the Ramayanam en 2 livres sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in 1732 for the library of the king of France and mentioned in an ancien list (BnF NAF 5442, f9v).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 42, nos. 275-276.
S.n. 1739. Catalogus codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae regiae. Tomus primus. Pars prima, complectens codices manuscriptos orientales. Paris: Typographia Regia. — See p. 436, no. XLI.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 64r, nos. 275-276.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
